text: @marklevinshow Hey dumb fuq! COVID-19 didn't exist in 2008, and he had this prescription for malaria treatment but it isn't even hydroxychloroquine. Your "gotcha" tweet is ridiculous on its face and you look like even more of a trump fellating a$$hole than usual! Go fuq yourself mark!
